content.text: Okay, let me check the weather forecast for Sacramento:

messages.content:
Overnight:
Temperature: 58°F
Wind: 7 mph NNW
Forecast: Clear, with a low around 58. North northwest wind around 7 mph.

---

Tuesday:
Temperature: 87°F
Wind: 7 mph NNW
Forecast: Sunny, with a high near 87. North northwest wind around 7 mph.

---

Tuesday Night:
Temperature: 53°F
Wind: 7 mph SSW
Forecast: Clear, with a low around 53. South southwest wind around 7 mph.

---

Wednesday:
Temperature: 82°F
Wind: 6 to 10 mph SSW
Forecast: Sunny, with a high near 82. South southwest wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

---

Wednesday Night:
Temperature: 53°F
Wind: 3 to 10 mph SSW
Forecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. South southwest wind 3 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.
messages.name: get_forecast

messages.content: The forecast shows it will be sunny with highs around 87°F on Tuesday and 82°F on Wednesday in Sacramento. Overnight lows will be in the low to mid 50s.
